label: SQL Server 2014 Enterprise Optimized for DataWarehousing Workloads
displayName: SQL Server 2014 Enterprise Optimized for DataWarehousing Workloads
description: This Enterprise Edition image is optimized for data warehousing workloads and is intended for VM sizes including A4, A7, A8, A9, D4, D13 and D14. Once deployed, the VM comes with Windows Storage Spaces pre-configured. This image has been pre-configured for Windows Azure, including enabling CEIP which can be disabled, for more info see here.This image supports data sizes of up to 2TB for A7, 4TB for A8 and 6TB for A9, respectively, using clustered columnstore indexes.

links.label: Feature comparison between SQL server 2014 editions
